body_html: global_step should be fine and it is not affected. You can access and get the timeline for global_step using tensorflow profiler. Make sure to include tf.contrib.framework.create_or_get_global_step() or tf.train.create_or_get_global_step() in your code.

body: global_step should be fine and it is not affected. You can access and get the timeline for global_step using tensorflow profiler. Make sure to include tf.contrib.framework.create_or_get_global_step() or tf.train.create_or_get_global_step() in your code.
